newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss bonds end steady in slack pre-FOMC trade.
newsitem.headline: Swiss bonds end steady in slack pre-FOMC trade.

text.p: 1615 GMT - Swiss franc bonds moved sideways and ended steady in slack trade, with dealers describing the situation as quiet before news from the U.S. FOMC meeting, expected at 1815 GMT.
Most market participants expect no change in interest rates.
* 4-1/2 pct June 2007 yields 3.330 pct vs 3.336 pct
